question: The office you work in does not have any cafeteria for staff. Write a letter to your manager to request setting up a cafeteria for the staff. In your letter, you should tell • what you heard about the inconvenience from the staff • how you feel about it  • what suggestions you have about setting up a cafeteria
text: I am writing this letter to inform you about inconvenience facing by company’s staff due to lack of cafeteria within our company.

The issue related to the cafe is raised by all the workers in the last social meeting of our company. The majority of workers want a place where they can sit for their break and can refresh themselves with tea or coffee along with some snacks. I think it is very important to set up a canteen as we have been working on a very critical and urgent project. Now, workers have to go to the next side of the road to bring snacks and tea which waste their productive time. Moreover, room number B-6 is not occupied and I consider it best for the café because this room is large in space and easily accessible to all rooms.
I hope you will understand the problem and arrange to set up a cafeteria for the staff of our company.
